column10: note: constraints/conditions 10002 to 10007 must be checked to ensure they are all upheld

Description: Start APU master switch (set to on)
flight data recorder: gnd ctl on
emergency exit light to lights on
Test battery: shut off batteries then restart them
extinguish lights on fuel panel by setting ALL 6 fuel pumps to automatic
Engine fire tests for both engines
Check that anti skid is on
Check each MCDU transmitting on interphone
Check each MCDU set on public address
Check that 4 switchings are in their normal positions
Check left MCDU is on VHF1 freq
Check right MCDU is on VHF2 freq
(Traffic collision avoidance system) Check both selectors are on their standby positions
Go to next page of MCDU/click right arrow
Set all waypoints for flight path
(Left side) Check that flight director (FD) is on
(Right side) Check that flight director (FD) is on
Set initial climb altitude on top panel
Call air traffic control for takeoff clearance
Set engine mode selector to start

Attentional: (check for takeoff should be complete at this point)
